channel.title: Voices from the Yom Kippur War
channel.itunes:author: Historical Archives
channel.itunes:summary: A personal account of life during the Yom Kippur War through family audio recordings and historical context.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Family stories from the front lines of history.
channel.description: A personal account of life during the Yom Kippur War through family audio recordings and historical context.

item.title: 1: Waiting in the Shadow
item.description: Imagine waiting for the joyous news of your first grandchild, but the phone lines are silent, and the air outside hums with the tension of war. This is the reality facing one family in October 1973. This episode introduces the central family anxiously awaiting news of a birth amidst the backdrop of the Yom Kippur War. It establishes their deep worry, the sacrifices being made on the home front, and their fervent hopes for both family health and national victory.
